verbs.description: President Trump 's climate retreat [V: has] served as a call to action for state legislators to go even further on climate solutions , say State Senators De Leon and Ranker .

President Trump 's climate retreat has served as a call to action for state legislators to go even further on climate solutions , [V: say] [ARG0: State Senators De Leon and Ranker] .
